description: Iccanobif numbers: add reversal of a(n-1) to a(n-2).
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: R:= n-> (s-> parse(cat(s[-i]$i=1..length(s))))(""||n):a:= proc(n) option remember; `if`(n<2, n,       R(a(n-1)) +a(n-2))    end:seq(a(n), n=0..50);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 18 2014
mathematica: a[0] = 0; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = FromDigits[ Reverse[ IntegerDigits[ a[n - 1]]]] + a[n - 2]; Table[ a[n], {n, 0, 36}] (_Robert G. Wilson v_)
crossrefs: See A000045 for the Fibonacci numbers.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
